channel.title: Save file confusiom
channel.description:
I recently deleted all traces of POS(Player owned shops) from my server. But now I've run into a problem much worse. For some reason, the server gives no errors but it can't recongize any files, saves nothing and player files don't even have ranks, such as me not having owner anymore even though my rights set to 11.
Extremely Serious problem. Need help.

item.title: Save file confusiom
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Kodiak:

I hate helping people, but I remember having this problem about 5 years ago when I was a young padawan. Send me your playerSave and other save files, I forgot what they’re called in PI.

Get out of this section then.

Anyways, you deleted all the P.O.S’s from the server, but not the player save files. So it has lines it doesn’t understand in each player’s text file. You’re to have to either A) delete all the traces of P.O.S. lines in each text file. Or B) delete all accounts (I’d back up in case this method doesn’t work) and start over.

Read full topic

item.title: Save file confusiom
item.dc:creator: @Helicobacter Helicobacter
item.description:
@Helicobacter wrote:

Vernixpk. I think it has to deal with the loadgame and savegame class in playersave.java. This is were i originally had problems while removing POS from server.

Read full topic
